languages.text: Узнав об участи, постигшей слуг дома фон Валанциус в лагере, Идира Тласс уходит в себя на несколько минут, будто прислушивается к чему-то незримому. По ее словам, один из офицеров счел исследования ересью и хотел предать Леди Теодору. Не сумев его вычислить и желая сохранить свои изыскания в тайне, она приказала устранить весь отряд.

traits.locale_text: Узнав о расколе и участи, постигшей слуг дома фон Валанциус в лагере, Идира Тласс уходит в себя на несколько минут, будто прислушивается к чему-то незримому. По ее словам, госпожа Теодора имела все основания избавиться от людей, которые знали то, что могло ее погубить.

languages.text: Having learned of the fate that befell the servants of House von Valancius in the camp, Idira Tlass retreats into herself for a few minutes, as if listening to someone unseen. According to her, one of the officers considered the expedition heretical and wanted to betray Lady Theodora. Unable to single out the traitor and wanting to keep her research secret, she ordered the whole squad to be eliminated.
languages.original_text: Узнав об участи, постигшей слуг дома фон Валанциус в лагере, Идира Тласс уходит в себя на несколько минут, будто прислушивается к чему-то незримому. По ее словам, один из офицеров счел исследования ересью и хотел предать Леди Теодору. Не сумев его вычислить и желая сохранить свои изыскания в тайне, она приказала устранить весь отряд.

traits.locale_text: Having learned about the fate that befell the servants of House von Valancius in the camp, Idira Tlass retreats into herself for a few minutes, as if listening to someone unseen. As she tells it, one of the officers considered the expedition heretical and wanted to betray Lady Theodora. Unable to single out the traitor and wanting to keep her research secret, she ordered the whole squad to be eliminated.

As she tells it, one of the officers considered the expedition heretical and wanted to betray Lady Theodora. Unable to single out the traitor and wanting to keep her research secret, she ordered the whole squad to be eliminated.

According to her, one of the officers considered the expedition heretical and wanted to betray Lady Theodora. Unable to single out the traitor and wanting to keep her research secret, she ordered the whole squad to be eliminated.

According to her, one of the officers considered the expedition heretical and wanted to betray Lady Theodora. Unable to single out the traitor and wanting to keep her research secret, she ordered the whole squad to be eliminated.

languages.text: 伊迪拉·特拉斯得知了营地中冯·瓦兰修斯家族仆人的遭遇之后，一个人静静地自言自语了好几分钟，仿佛在听某个看不见的人说话。据她解释，这件事情的起因，是某位军官认为这次远征是异端行径，打算背叛西奥多拉夫人。西奥多拉无法找出叛徒，也不愿公开她的计划，于是便下令将整支小队消灭。
languages.original_text: Having learned of the fate that befell the servants of House von Valancius in the camp, Idira Tlass retreats into herself for a few minutes, as if listening to someone unseen. According to her, one of the officers considered the expedition heretical and wanted to betray Lady Theodora. Unable to single out the traitor and wanting to keep her research secret, she ordered the whole squad to be eliminated.

traits.locale_text: 伊迪拉·特拉斯得知了营地中冯·瓦兰修斯家族仆人的遭遇之后，一个人静静地自言自语了好几分钟，仿佛在听某个看不见的人说话。据她解释，这件事情的起因，是某位军官认为这次远征是异端行径，打算背叛西奥多拉夫人。西奥多拉无法找出叛徒，也不愿公开她的计划，于是便下令将整支小队消灭。

languages.text: キャンプでフォン・ヴァランシウス家の従者たちに降りかかった運命を知ったイディラ・タラースは、まるで目に見えない誰かの声を聞いているかのように、数分間自分の殻に引きこもった。彼女によると、士官のひとりがこの遠征を異端であると考え、シオドーラ夫人を裏切ろうとしたという。裏切り者を特定することができなかったシオドーラは、自分の研究を秘密にしておくため、チーム全員の抹殺を命じた。
languages.original_text: Having learned of the fate that befell the servants of House von Valancius in the camp, Idira Tlass retreats into herself for a few minutes, as if listening to someone unseen. According to her, one of the officers considered the expedition heretical and wanted to betray Lady Theodora. Unable to single out the traitor and wanting to keep her research secret, she ordered the whole squad to be eliminated.

traits.locale_text: キャンプでフォン・ヴァランシウス家の従者たちに降りかかった運命を知ったイディラ・タラースは、まるで目に見えない誰かの声を聞いているかのように、数分間自分の殻に引きこもった。彼女によると、士官のひとりがこの遠征を異端であると考え、シオドーラ夫人を裏切ろうとしたという。裏切り者を特定することができなかったシオドーラは、自分の研究を秘密にしておくため、チーム全員の抹殺を命じた。

languages.text: Tras enterarse de la suerte que corrieron los sirvientes de la casa von Valancius en el campamento, Idira Tlass se ensimisma durante unos minutos, como si escuchara a alguien invisible. Según ella, uno de los oficiales consideraba una herejía la expedición y quería traicionar a lady Theodora. Incapaz de señalar al traidor y deseosa de mantener en secreto su investigación, ordenó eliminar a todo el escuadrón.
languages.original_text: Having learned of the fate that befell the servants of House von Valancius in the camp, Idira Tlass retreats into herself for a few minutes, as if listening to someone unseen. According to her, one of the officers considered the expedition heretical and wanted to betray Lady Theodora. Unable to single out the traitor and wanting to keep her research secret, she ordered the whole squad to be eliminated.

traits.locale_text: Tras enterarse de la suerte que corrieron los sirvientes de la casa von Valancius en el campamento, Idira Tlass se ensimisma durante unos minutos, como si escuchara a alguien invisible. Según ella, uno de los oficiales consideraba una herejía la expedición y quería traicionar a lady Theodora. Incapaz de señalar al traidor y deseosa de mantener en secreto su investigación, ordenó eliminar a todo el escuadrón.

languages.text: Als sie erfährt, welches Schicksal die Diener des Hauses Valancius in dem Lager befallen hat, zieht sich Idira Tlass einige Minuten lang in sich selbst zurück, als würde sie einem unsichtbaren Gesprächspartner zuhören. Laut ihr sah einer der Offizier die Expedition als ketzerisch an und wollte Lady Theodora verraten. Da sie den Verräter nicht identifizieren konnte, ihre Forschungen aber geheim halten wollte, ließ sie den gesamten Trupp hinrichten.
languages.original_text: Having learned of the fate that befell the servants of House von Valancius in the camp, Idira Tlass retreats into herself for a few minutes, as if listening to someone unseen. According to her, one of the officers considered the expedition heretical and wanted to betray Lady Theodora. Unable to single out the traitor and wanting to keep her research secret, she ordered the whole squad to be eliminated.

traits.locale_text: Als sie erfährt, welches Schicksal die Diener des Hauses Valancius in dem Lager befallen hat, zieht sich Idira Tlass einige Minuten lang in sich selbst zurück, als würde sie einem unsichtbaren Gesprächspartner zuhören. Laut ihr sah einer der Offizier die Expedition als ketzerisch an und wollte Lady Theodora verraten. Da sie den Verräter nicht identifizieren konnte, ihre Forschungen aber geheim halten wollte, ließ sie den gesamten Trupp hinrichten.

languages.text: Dès qu'elle apprend le sort réservé aux serviteurs de la maison von Valancius qui campaient là, Idira Tlass se mure dans le silence pendant quelques minutes, comme si elle écoutait une voix perceptible d'elle seule. À l'en croire, l'un des officiers, jugeant cette entreprise hérétique, s'apprêtait à trahir dame Théodora. Faute de pouvoir identifier le traître et déterminée à préserver la confidentialité de ses recherches, elle a ordonné l'exécution de l'ensemble du groupe.
languages.original_text: Having learned of the fate that befell the servants of House von Valancius in the camp, Idira Tlass retreats into herself for a few minutes, as if listening to someone unseen. According to her, one of the officers considered the expedition heretical and wanted to betray Lady Theodora. Unable to single out the traitor and wanting to keep her research secret, she ordered the whole squad to be eliminated.

traits.locale_text: Dès qu'elle apprend le sort réservé aux serviteurs de la maison von Valancius qui campaient là, Idira Tlass se mure dans le silence pendant quelques minutes, comme si elle écoutait une voix perceptible d'elle seule. À l'en croire, l'un des officiers, jugeant cette entreprise hérétique, s'apprêtait à trahir dame Théodora. Faute de pouvoir identifier le traître et déterminée à préserver la confidentialité de ses recherches, elle a ordonné l'exécution de l'ensemble du groupe.

languages.text: Kamptaki von Valancius Hanesi hizmetkârlarının başına gelenleri öğrenen İdira Tlass, sanki görünmeyen birini dinliyormuşçasına birkaç dakikalığına sessizliğe gömülüyor. Ona göre subaylardan biri, bu yolculuğun kâfirlik olduğunu düşünüyormuş ve Leydi Theodora'ya ihanet etmek istemiş. Leydi Theodora da hainin kim olduğunu bulamayınca ve araştırmayı gizli tutmak isteyince de tüm ekibin ortadan kaldırılmasını emretmiş.
languages.original_text: Having learned of the fate that befell the servants of House von Valancius in the camp, Idira Tlass retreats into herself for a few minutes, as if listening to someone unseen. According to her, one of the officers considered the expedition heretical and wanted to betray Lady Theodora. Unable to single out the traitor and wanting to keep her research secret, she ordered the whole squad to be eliminated.
